testcase.system-out:
Successfully loaded SM-BC library with exports: [AbstractECMultiplier, Arrays, AsymmetricKeyParameter, BigIntegers, Bytes, CoordinateSystem, CryptoException, DataLengthException, ECConstants, ECCurveAbstractFp, ECCurveFp, ECDomainParameters, ECFieldElement, ECFieldElementFp, ECKeyParameters, ECPointAbstractFp, ECPointFp, ECPrivateKeyParameters, ECPublicKeyParameters, FixedPointCombMultiplier, Integers, InvalidCipherTextException, KDF, Pack, ParametersWithRandom, SM2, SM2Engine, SM2Mode, SM2Signer, SM3Digest, SecureRandom, SimpleECMultiplier]
=== Testing Java Sign → JavaScript Verify === Java signature length: 71 bytes Java signature (hex): 30450221008885242ee11541c5bc661aef734a87b2a3199aab8812183bab04570f6bfa662d02203960d74fe614295fca46365abfd48a5ac9ec9d80b06501835deebc6bea6b8007 JS verifying signature of length: 71 JS public key x: d6f200350400269e608964b746507351cd217432bba838c7e421cd85ee1f755d JS public key y: 6cc3a376994a65240c0c85951c2286db0ea2e535327ca783d68bc2dd9b4d9e0a ✓ Java signature successfully verified by JavaScript
testcase.system-err: [To redirect Truffle log output to a file use one of the following options: * '--log.file=<path>' if the option is passed using a guest language launcher. * '-Dpolyglot.log.file=<path>' if the option is passed using the host Java launcher. * Configure logging using the polyglot embedding API.] [engine] WARNING: The polyglot engine uses a fallback runtime that does not support runtime compilation to native code. Execution without runtime compilation will negatively impact the guest application performance. The following cause was found: JVMCI is required to enable optimizations. Pass -XX:+EnableJVMCI as a virtual machine argument to the java executable to resolve this. For more information see: https://www.graalvm.org/latest/reference-manual/embed-languages/. To disable this warning use the '--engine.WarnInterpreterOnly=false' option or the '-Dpolyglot.engine.WarnInterpreterOnly=false' system property.
